reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Trinidad - Participation in Customs and Border Protection Agriculture Specialist Training, Frederick, Maryland

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award APHIS and regional partners sponsor the training of greater Caribbean Plant Quarantine officers through an annual two week training program for officers from quarantine offices throughout the Caribbean. This project supported the attendance by one of the instructors for this annual program at the training for Customs and Border Protection Agricultural Specialists at APHIS' training facility in Frederick, Maryland. She observed various training sessions during the week of June 2-5, 2015. Her attendance at this session was designed to enable her to gain knowledge and skills related to Pest Identification training for Quarantine officers..
